> Perceptor shouted "We shall run for our lives... Follw me!!!!"
> Perceptor ran towards the exit.

As Perceptor moved swiftly towards the door, Rodimus, Cyclonus and Scourge kinda shuffled slowly foward, as swiftly as thier drained forms could manage. 

Inside the next room it looks like a command center. A center chair with other foward stations, presumably for weapons, navigation and other assorted funtions. In the center chair Zarak is held their imprisoned by belts and straps, with cables running to him. He looks to be unconscious. 

On the foward screen there is a containment breach in progress with a count down in progress, the same one that the voice can still be heard counting . . 

53 . . . 52 . . . 51 . . . 50 . . . 49 . . . 

(TAG: Perceptor)


> Darkfate Followed Maruader,s till holding nightstrike.

Marauder is swifter then one might imagine, and the path they are taking is generally straight. Ahead there is the softest haze of light as if there is some openeing ahead, far in the distance, leading into the surface world above. 

Marauder picks up speed. 

(TAG or TBC)
